title: Rodeo Finn
description: Finn Dwyer, aged fifteen, is growing up on a dairy farm in Ireland, her thoughts of horses and friendships. When she is challenged by a tragedy, she doesn't know how to go forward in life. Summer on her uncle's ranch in Arizona with her cousin Sean and a beautiful black mare Juana gives Finn the chance to let go of her unhappiness. Not only does she explore the Sonora Desert, she learns trail riding, cattle roping and rodeo skills. When her strength and decisiveness are called upon however, will Finn prove herself? Another atmospheric story of young adults, horses and challenges from the author of SHOW JUMPING TEAM and A PONY FOR QUARANTINE.
author: Clare O'Beara
